Package edu.vt.middleware.ldap.search

Interface Summary
PostProcessor PostProcesser provides methods for processing query results before they are sent back to clients.
 

Class Summary
LdapPoolManager LdapPoolManager provides a management interface to a collection of LdapPool objects.
PeopleSearch PeopleSearch queries an LDAP and returns the result as DSML or LDIF.
Query Query contains query related data.
QueryDataPostProcessor QueryDataPostProcesser adds relevant query information to search results.
QueryResult QueryResult contains search results and related data.
SearchExecutor SearchExecuter contains the basic methods necessary for performing a Ldap query.
SearchThread SearchThread performs an Ldap query.
 

Enum Summary
LdapPoolManager.PoolType Enum to define the type pools to be managed.
PeopleSearch.OutputFormat Valid DSML versions.
 

Exception Summary
PeopleSearchException PeopleSearchException encapsulates the many exceptions that can occur when searching a LDAP and managing XML.
